content: this pattern is a good stash buster - using 100g of the main colour approx 75g of the second colour and an oddment for the edging the bag usings traditional and tapestry crochet techniques errata - updated on original pattern 5th november 2015 stitch counts are as follows initial round - 2dc in 3rd chain from hook 1 double_crochet into each of next 60 chain 4 double_crochet into end chain 1 double_crochet into bottom of each of the 60 double_crochet 2dc in end join - 128 sts round 2 increase 3 at each end - 134 round 3 increase 3 at each end - 140 round 4 increase 3 at each end - 146 round 5 increase 3 at each end - 152 round 6 increase 2 at each end - 156
